name: Fashion Superstar: Ultimate Dress Up
description:
Fashion Superstar is a massively social multiplayer dress up game that puts you onto the catwalk to compete against other live fashion models for amazing prizes!

Use your fashion sense to dress up your avatar in the trendiest looks. You become the designer! Choose from tons of outfits, accessories, and hairstyles to create millions of combinations.

Then make your best pitch to hundreds of live fans to get the most votes and become the Top Model at the fashion show.

Fashion Superstar is the perfect dress up game for everyone that loves creativity, style, fashion and social fun


Features
- Choose from hundreds of dresses, shoes, shirts, pants, hats, jewelry, bags and other accessories
- Select your hair, eyes, mouth, skin color and other features
- Dress up and compete on the catwalk to win great prizes
- Vote for winners and encourage them to be the next fashion stars
- Be social, make new friends and chat with other users
- Cool dance music tracks perfect for the catwalk
